name: fishmonger
description:
Your new employer does not care about fun while fishing. He wants to see success, efficiency and most importantly - rare fish.

What used to be a nice free time activity of yours now becomes a hard job. Deliver the fish as soon as possible!

The Team

code & pixelart by bitbrain

music & sfx by k0stnix

game design by k0stnix & bitbrain

This game has been developed in under 48 hours during theminibeansjam 3.

🐛 Bug Reports

Please report any bugs you encounter.
